actions.value:
Hi {{ticket.requester.name}},

Thanks for the query. If I was looking to get a website or blog setup I'd want it done by an expert. While I am an expert at supporting many consumer technologies, web development is not my area of expertise. Nonetheless, I have come across businesses small and large that might be worth considering.


I can help you get custom email @yourcompany.com, migrating to the cloud, managing computers and mobile devices. Let me know if you're interested in these services.

DIY website

Short on budget? Make your website. Look like an expert.


  • business site, blog and/or online store - squarespace.com

  • online store - shopify.com

  • design deck - canva.com

  • customer support - zendesk.com


Online Accounting

While we're talking about online services for a business, it's worth considering cloud accounting services.
